Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Have you ever thought perhaps the reality you are living is just a dream and your dream is the reality?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{3: 'You wake up to see nothing but snow that extends beyond the horizon. The cold wind is blowing.'}
{3: 'You have been walking for seven days in a row, but still, all you see is snow. Your human body cannot hold on any longer.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, you step on something hard buried in the snow. The day is dark, but with the dim light, you can vaguely tell it is a corpse dressed in a military protective suit.'}
{3: "You lay your hands on the corpse's neck. It is cold and stiff. Then, you rip off a slightly-worn name tag."}
{3: 'You wipe off the bloodstain on it and realize this name tag belongs to...'}
{3: '【kuroname】, the Gray Raven Commandant.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory514.jpg'}
{3: 'You wake up from the nightmare and your pillow is soaked in your cold sweat.'}
{3: 'Hurried footsteps come from outside the door. A figure in pink pushes open the door and looks at you with a worried look on her face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Morning, Commandant... Did you have a nightmare?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv takes out the handkerchief that she always carries with her and wipes away the sweat on your forehead.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'What did you see in the dream?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'A cold winter that lasted for decades.', 3: '30'}
{2: 'I died in the winter.', 3: '31'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's okay. The nightmare is over.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You let out a sigh and notice that you are not familiar with this room.'}
{2: 'What is this place?', 3: '37'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "What? You don't recognize it? This is our home. The four of us live together now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lucia, Lee... you, and me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Five years ago, the disaster caused by the Punishing Virus came to an end. Now, we are rebuilding a town in the western part of the world.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You try to search your memories, but everything is fragmented and blurred. You can't seem to reminisce much."}
{2: "I don't quite remember any of this.", 3: '47'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Well... It's probably because of your head injury.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "You have recovered, but since that day, you haven't been able to recall your memories.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She caresses your head where a scar once was. It is not there anymore, but Liv remembers exactly where it used to be.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '...Let me take a look.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl closes her eyes and uses the built-in diagnostic device of her Support frame to do a basic examination.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Hmm... Looks like you've been too tired lately.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'You helped us greatly when we were rebuilding.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having come to such a conclusion, she still looks worried. With her hands holding your head, she looks at you while stroking your cheek with her skinny fingers.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I'll give you another examination tonight. Take it easy today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Yes. We agreed yesterday that we would hang out at the newly built amusement park together.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Though she wants to spend more time with you, Liv turns around, takes out an outfit from the wardrobe, and puts it on the corner of your bed.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "It's 10 am now. We'll leave at 11, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Would you like me to help you get dressed?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No, thank you. I can do it myself.', 3: '71'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Well, breakfast is ready. Lucia and Lee are waiting for you downstairs.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "...I'll be there too.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With an amiable smile on her face, she nods at you and leaves the room.'}
{3: "Something doesn't seem right. No matter how hard you try to remember, you just cannot reminisce about anything that seems out of place."}
{3: 'You feel like you should remember something about how the Punishing Virus disaster ended five years ago and how Gray Raven helped people rebuild their homes.'}
{3: "But the memories are vague and strange. It is almost like you are reliving someone else's memories."}
{3: 'Perhaps it is as Liv said. The nightmare you had was too realistic and long-lasting. Is that why you are having trouble recalling memories?'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: '—Commandant!'}
{3: 'You hear Liv asking for you from downstairs.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory526.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I should've put you in Wanshi's room had I known you would oversleep this much.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sure, why not?', 3: '87', 4: 'Nah. Forget about it.', 5: '90'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Then another leader would try to wake you up.', 4: '1'}
{2: "That's not bad either.", 3: '90', 4: "Now that there are no more tasks for us to do, he probably won't behave like that anymore.", 5: '90'}
{3: 'Lee frowns and looks like he wants to say something. But before he can speak, Lucia comes in from another room and interrupts him.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Good morning, Commandant.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Good morning.', 3: '95'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Liv made breakfast today. Lee and I didn't help much.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'At least I did something instead of staying in bed and oversleeping.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Come on now, Lee... Commandant overslept because of a nightmare.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Explaining your dream)', 3: '106'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'That reminds me of the Gestalt Theory.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Speaking of which... I think I too have heard of it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "By Gestalt's calculation, we only had a 0.031% chance of living through disasters and war.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'That was a reckless move to make, after all.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Well, hadn't it been the miracle that day, we would've all died in that unforgiving winter.", 4: '1'}
{3: "You repeat these words in your mind and realize they don't sound strange at all."}
{3: 'Before the war came to an end, these words had become a synonym for several humans and Constructs that were able to create miracles. And apparently, you were amongst them.'}
{3: 'In the sea of blurred memories, you recall the speech of peace given by Hassen, "Every survivor who stands here today is a child of miracles."'}
{3: 'But are you really... standing here today?'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But those things are in the past. There's nothing to be worried about now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'All we have to do is rebuild our home.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Well, it has been only five years, but since we started using machines to help with the rebuild, things have been moving forward much faster.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory514.jpg'}
{3: 'While they are having a conversation, you look at the bedroom and see sunlight shining through the leaves and into the room.'}
{3: 'A few birds flap their wings and fly to the treetop, chirping and tweeting while dancing in the shades.'}
{3: "All of this is a sign of what you've been hoping for: peace."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, do you not like your breakfast?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having noticed that you are lost in thought, Liv waves her hand at you and then stands in front of you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Commandant's probably just spacing out.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Not really. I'm just thinking...", 3: '133'}
{2: "It's peaceful now. But is this real?", 3: '134'}
{2: "It's okay. You don't have to worry about that.", 3: '137'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is it PTSD? I heard that many retired Commandants suffer from that.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I am not very good at mental diagnosis. When we are done today, I'll take you to the hospital and get you checked.", 4: '1'}
{2: "That won't be necessary.", 3: '142', 4: 'Alright.', 5: '143'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Well, let's do it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'What matters the most right now is to have your breakfast.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She raises a scoop of soup and hands it to you.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Try it. I made this according to the new recipe you told me about.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You drink up the scoop of soup. It tastes as sweet as Liv's smile."}
{3: "During the endless fighting, every soldier was hoping for peace as you are living now. They just didn't realize it."}
{3: 'And now, you have awakened from the long-lasting nightmare you were previously trapped in. This beautiful world is your new reality.'}
{3: "...Don't ruin the peace with your anxiety and doubt... Right?"}
